statements: SELECT * FROM GeothermalEnergyProductionData;
SELECT id, location, production_date, production_value FROM GeothermalEnergyProductionData;
SELECT location, production_date, production_value, id FROM GeothermalEnergyProductionData;
SELECT * FROM GeothermalEnergyProductionData WHERE production_value > 10000;
SELECT id, location FROM GeothermalEnergyProductionData WHERE production_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM GeothermalEnergyProductionData ORDER BY production_date DESC, production_value DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, SUM(production_value) AS total_production FROM GeothermalEnergyProductionData GROUP BY location ORDER BY total_production DESC;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS production_count FROM GeothermalEnergyProductionData WHERE production_value > 10000 GROUP BY location ORDER BY production_count ASC;
SELECT AVG(production_value) AS average_production, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM production_date) AS production_year FROM GeothermalEnergyProductionData GROUP BY production_year ORDER BY production_year DESC;
SELECT id, location, production_date, production_value FROM GeothermalEnergyProductionData WHERE location LIKE '%California%' OR location LIKE '%Nevada%' ORDER BY production_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM GeothermalProduction;
SELECT production_id, production_rate, temperature_celsius FROM GeothermalProduction WHERE temperature_celsius > 100;
SELECT project_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM GeothermalProjects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT production_id, production_date, production_rate FROM GeothermalProduction WHERE production_rate > 500 ORDER BY production_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM GeothermalProjects WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT * FROM GeothermalProduction WHERE well_id = 1;
SELECT production_id, production_date, production_rate FROM GeothermalProduction WHERE temperature_celsius > 100 ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, location FROM GeothermalProjects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT SUM(production_rate) AS total_production FROM GeothermalProduction;
SELECT * FROM GeothermalProduction JOIN GeothermalProjects ON GeothermalProduction.well_id = GeothermalProjects.project_id;
SELECT * FROM geothermal_production_data;
SELECT location, date, daily_production FROM geothermal_production_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM geothermal_projects WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM geothermal_projects WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT trend_name, start_date, end_date, trend_description FROM geothermal_trends ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM geothermal_production_data WHERE location='California' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM geothermal_projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM geothermal_trends WHERE trend_name LIKE '%efficiency%' ORDER BY trend_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, daily_production FROM geothermal_production_data WHERE daily_production > 1000 ORDER BY id;
SELECT project_name, location FROM geothermal_projects WHERE location='Nevada' AND start_date < '2022-06-30' ORDER BY project_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT plant_name, location FROM geothermal_plants;
SELECT * FROM production_records ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT plant_name, capacity_mw FROM geothermal_plants WHERE capacity_mw > 50;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled' OR maintenance_type = 'Emergency';
SELECT plant_name, geological_feature, depth_meters FROM geothermal_plants JOIN geological_data ON geothermal_plants.plant_id = geological_data.plant_id;
SELECT * FROM geothermal_plants WHERE capacity_mw > 50 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT plant_name, capacity_mw FROM geothermal_plants WHERE location = 'California' ORDER BY capacity_mw DESC;

SELECT P.plant_name, PR.production_date, PR.production_mwh FROM geothermal_plants P JOIN production_records PR ON P.plant_id = PR.plant_id WHERE PR.production_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT GP.location, ML.maintenance_date, ML.maintenance_type FROM geothermal_plants GP JOIN maintenance_logs ML ON GP.plant_id = ML.plant_id WHERE ML.maintenance_type = 'Scheduled' ORDER BY ML.maintenance_date DESC;

SELECT GD.geological_feature, GD.depth_meters, GP.plant_name FROM geological_data GD JOIN geothermal_plants GP ON GD.plant_id = GP.plant_id WHERE GD.depth_meters >= 1000 ORDER BY GD.depth_meters DESC;
SELECT * FROM geothermal_plants;
SELECT plant_name, location, capacity_kW FROM geothermal_plants;
SELECT plant_name, capacity_kW, location FROM geothermal_plants;
SELECT * FROM production_data WHERE plant_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM geothermal_plants WHERE capacity_kW > 5000 ORDER BY location DESC;

SELECT p.plant_name, pd.production_date, pd.production_kWh FROM geothermal_plants AS p INNER JOIN production_data AS pd ON p.plant_id = pd.plant_id WHERE pd.production_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT plant_name, SUM(production_kWh) AS total_production FROM geothermal_plants AS p JOIN production_data AS pd ON p.plant_id = pd.plant_id GROUP BY plant_name ORDER BY total_production DESC;
SELECT location, AVG(temperature_celsius) AS avg_temp FROM temperature_data GROUP BY location HAVING avg_temp > 25;
SELECT plant_id, COUNT(maintenance_type) AS maintenance_count FROM maintenance_logs GROUP BY plant_id HAVING maintenance_count > 3 ORDER BY maintenance_count DESC;
